title: HunnyFinance
author: HunnyFinance
content: Earn Passive Income With $Hunny Crypto by Staking. 65% APR paid in BNB, BUSD & CAKEWhat started off as a yield farming project has evolved into a prominent casino platform in the Web3 space, but that aside, Let’s talk about their native token, $HUNNY. No more new tokens minted and in return, this is a good cause for price stability.–  Burned tokens15.6 million tokens burned so far. This makes the total supply in circulation only 84.4 Million.–  SustainabilityWith the casino as a revenue-generating model, this is sustainable.–  More than just farmingYou can join as a partner and refer your friends to have fun in the casino, HunnyPlay has one of the highest cashback programs in the market now at 28%! At the same time, you get to earn referral fees too.
